content: for adult scarf above but with 100 double_crochet and only 7 row total as follows foundation row with size j hook chain 104 double_crochet in 4th st from hook and ea chain across 100 double_crochet repeat row 1-3 twice to end up with 7 row total including the foundation row work single_crochet border as in adult scarf finish off and weave in ends copyright 2008 2015 designs by kn www designsbykn com for personal or charity use only do not reproduce pattern for commercial purposes 3
